venue.name: Peter's Park - Joe Wex Dog Run

item.description:
Our Second April Meetup will be on a Sunday and a bit later due to many requests. Let's try this out at our home base Peter's Park in the South End. I hope to explore some new venues soon but the smaller fenced in area is perfect for our group.

If anyone is up for heading up to JP to the dog friendly bar for an adult drink with the dog's after - sounds good!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the French Bulldog Meetup TeeShirt

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: The second April Frenchie meetup
